titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for the sine die adjournment of the 100th Congress.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/22/1988--Introduced. Provides for the sine die adjournment of the 100th Congress on October 22, 1988.
